item.title: Open-Source Highlight: Jellyfin
item.description: Open-source projects are plentiful, so I decided to highlight a few standouts which deserve some extra love. Well… all of them deserve extra love, but I’d like to highlight a few of my (100% biased) favorites. First up is a self-hosted media server I’ve had the pleasure of using for several years, now – Jellyfin. What is Jellyfin Jellyfin allows you to host the TV Series/Films/Music you own on a single server, and access this media from any device either through a web browser or client.
